pullrequest.title: AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8 integration over ros topics with k_effort

content.raw:
Comment should be updated to show that `k_effort` is multiplied by the entire sum, i.e., (I think):

    #   k_effort * 
    #   (kp_position     * ( position - measured_position )       +
    #    ki_position     * 1/s * ( position - measured_position ) +
    #    kd_position     * s * ( position - measured_position ) +
    #    kp_velocity     * ( velocity - measured_velocity )     +
    #    effort) +
    #   (1 - k_effort)  * effort_bdi
content.html:
Comment should be updated to show that k_effort is multiplied by the entire sum, i.e., (I think):

#   k_effort * 
#   (kp_position     * ( position - measured_position )       +
#    ki_position     * 1/s * ( position - measured_position ) +
#    kd_position     * s * ( position - measured_position ) +
#    kp_velocity     * ( velocity - measured_velocity )     +
#    effort) +
#   (1 - k_effort)  * effort_bdi
